sections.heading: What is 回 (かい)?
sections.content:
回 (kai) is the counter for times, occurrences, or frequency of actions. It answers "how many times?"

日本に3回行きました "I went to Japan 3 times" 1日に何回食べますか？ "How many times a day do you eat?"

sections.heading: Complete 回 Counter Chart
sections.content: | Number | Reading | Romaji | | ------ | ----------------- | --------- | | 1 回 | いっかい | ikkai | | 2 回 | にかい | ni-kai | | 3 回 | さんかい | san-kai | | 4 回 | よんかい | yon-kai | | 5 回 | ごかい | go-kai | | 6 回 | ろっかい | rokkai | | 7 回 | ななかい | nana-kai | | 8 回 | はちかい/はっかい | hachi-kai | | 9 回 | きゅうかい | kyuu-kai | | 10 回 | じゅっかい | jukkai |

children.heading: Larger Numbers
children.content: 11回 = じゅういっかい 20回 = にじゅっかい 50回 = ごじゅっかい 100回 = ひゃっかい 1,000回 = せんかい

sections.heading: Sound Changes
sections.content:
Minimal sound changes:

1 回 = いっかい (っ inserted) 6 回 = ろっかい (っ inserted) 8 回 = はちかい or はっかい 10 回 = じゅっかい

Much simpler than 本, 匹, or 杯!

children.heading: Actions/Activities
children.content:
行く - going 来る - coming 見る - watching/seeing 食べる - eating 飲む - drinking 会う - meeting 読む - reading 言う - saying

映画を3回見ました "I watched the movie 3 times" 日本に5回行きました "I've been to Japan 5 times" もう一回言ってください "Please say it one more time"

children.heading: Events/Occurrences
children.content:
試験 (しけん) - exams 会議 (かいぎ) - meetings 練習 (れんしゅう) - practice 授業 (じゅぎょう) - classes イベント - events

会議が1日に3回あります "There are 3 meetings a day" 試験に2回失敗しました "I failed the exam 2 times"

children.heading: Frequency Patterns
children.content:
1日に〜回 - times per day 1週間に〜回 - times per week 1ヶ月に〜回 - times per month 1年に〜回 - times per year

1日に3回食べます "I eat 3 times a day" 週に2回ジムに行きます "I go to the gym twice a week" 月に1回映画を見ます "I watch a movie once a month" 年に4回旅行します "I travel 4 times a year"

children.heading: 何回 (なんかい)
children.content: 何回行きましたか？ "How many times did you go?" 何回見ましたか？ "How many times did you watch it?" 1日に何回食べますか？ "How many times a day do you eat?" 何回練習しましたか？ "How many times did you practice?"

children.heading: Action + 回 + Verb
children.content: 3回行きました "I went 3 times" 5回見ました "I watched it 5 times" 2回読みました "I read it 2 times"

children.heading: Time Period + に + 回
children.content: 1日に3回 "3 times a day" 週に2回 "Twice a week" 月に1回 "Once a month" 年に何回も "Many times a year"

children.heading: 回 + の + Noun
children.content: 3回の練習 "3 practice sessions" 2回の試験 "2 exams" 5回の会議 "5 meetings"

children.heading: Example 1: Travel
children.content: A: 日本に何回行ったことがありますか？ "How many times have you been to Japan?" B: 3回行ったことがあります "I've been 3 times" A: いいですね！ "That's great!"

children.heading: Example 2: Movies
children.content: A: この映画、何回見ましたか？ "How many times have you watched this movie?" B: もう5回も見ました "I've already watched it 5 times" A: そんなに面白いんですか？ "Is it that interesting?" B: はい、とても面白いです "Yes, it's very interesting"

children.heading: Example 3: Exercise
children.content: A: 週に何回運動しますか？ "How many times a week do you exercise?" B: 週に3回ぐらいです "About 3 times a week" A: すごいですね "That's impressive"

children.heading: Example 4: Studying
children.content: A: この単語、何回練習しましたか？ "How many times did you practice this word?" B: 10回練習しました "I practiced it 10 times" A: それでも覚えられませんか？ "Still can't remember it?" B: はい、難しいです "Yes, it's difficult"

children.heading: もう一回 (one more time)
children.content:
Very common expression:

もう一回言ってください "Please say it one more time" もう一回見たい "I want to see it one more time" もう一回やってみます "I'll try one more time"

children.heading: 〜回目 (ordinal)
children.content: 1回目 (いっかいめ) - the first time 2回目 (にかいめ) - the second time 3回目 (さんかいめ) - the third time これは2回目です "This is the second time" 3回目で成功しました "I succeeded on the third try"

children.heading: 何回も (many times)
children.content: 何回も言いました "I said it many times" 何回も行ったことがあります "I've been many times" 何回も失敗しました "I failed many times"

children.heading: 〜回ずつ (each time)
children.content: 一回ずつやってください "Please do it one time each" 10回ずつ練習します "Practice 10 times each"

children.heading: 〜回しか (only)
children.content: 1回しか行ったことがない "I've only been once" 2回しか見ていません "I've only seen it twice"

children.heading: 〜回も (as many as)
children.content: 10回も見た "I watched it as many as 10 times" 5回も失敗した "I failed as many as 5 times"

sections.heading: 回 vs 度 (ど)
sections.content: Both mean "times" but have different uses:

children.heading: 回 (かい) - Counting occurrences
children.content: 1回、2回、3回... (いっかい、にかい、さんかい) Used for: counting specific instances 日本に3回行きました "I went to Japan 3 times"

children.heading: 度 (ど) - Also times, but different nuance
children.content: 一度 (いちど) - once 二度 (にど) - twice 三度 (さんど) - three times More literary, often in set phrases: 一度も〜ない - never (not even once) 何度も - many times もう一度 - one more time

children.heading: Usage Comparison
children.content: Both OK: もう一回 = もう一度 (one more time) 何回も = 何度も (many times) 回 preferred: 1日に3回 ✓ 1日に3度 ⚠️ (less common) 度 preferred: 一度も行ったことがない ✓ "I've never been" (not even once)

children.heading: Mistake 1: Confusing 回 with 階 (floors)
children.content:
Both read かい but different meanings:

3回 = さんかい (3 times) ✓ 3階 = さんがい (3rd floor) ✓ Context makes it clear!

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using wrong particle
children.content: Wrong: 週で2回 ❌ Right: 週に2回 ✓ "Twice a week"

children.heading: Mistake 3: Forgetting the counter
children.content: Wrong: 3行きました ❌ Right: 3回行きました ✓ "I went 3 times"

children.heading: Mistake 4: Using 回 for duration
children.content: Wrong: 2回時間がかかる ❌ Right: 2時間かかる ✓ "It takes 2 hours" 回 = times/occurrences 時間 = hours/time duration

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 何回行った？ "How many times did you go?" 3回見た "I watched it 3 times" もう一回！ "One more time!"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 何回行きましたか？ "How many times did you go?" 3回見ました "I watched it 3 times" もう一回お願いします "One more time, please"

children.heading: Formal
children.content: 何回お越しになりましたか？ "How many times have you come?" (honorific) 会議は月に2回ございます "There are 2 meetings per month"

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 映画を2回見ました "I watched the movie twice" 日本に3回行きました "I went to Japan 3 times" もう一回言ってください "Please say it one more time"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 1日に何回歯を磨きますか？ "How many times a day do you brush your teeth?" 週に3回ジムに行きます "I go to the gym 3 times a week" この本を5回も読みました "I've read this book as many as 5 times"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: 彼女に何回も電話したが、出なかった "I called her many times, but she didn't answer" 一度も日本に行ったことがありません "I've never been to Japan (not even once)" 3回目の挑戦でやっと成功しました "I finally succeeded on my third attempt"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: Counter System Basics - How counters work Frequency expressions - How often Time expressions - When and how long 度 (do) - Alternative times counter 〜ことがある - Experience expression Time particles - に、で usage

6 回 = ろっかい (っ inserted)
8 回 = はちかい or はっかい
